from numpy import nan
from pandas import read_csv
# load all data
dataset = read_csv(' household_power_consumption.txt' , sep=' ;' , header=0, low_memory=False,
infer_datetime_format=True, parse_dates={' datetime' :[0,1]}, index_col=[' datetime' ])
# summarize
print(dataset.shape)
